verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees. <S%H4609><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> you the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you servants <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which by night <S%H3915><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Lift <S%H5375><s%> up your hands <S%H3027><s%> in the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> that made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> you out of Zion. <S%H6726><s%>
